title: Police seeking man in connection with Birmingham murder
description: Officers were called to reports of a man being found with stab injuries at an address in Alum Rock Road, Birmingham, just after 7am on Friday.
content:
Police have shared pictures of a man they want to speak to in connection with a murder in Birmingham.
West Midlands Police said officers want to speak with Asad Khan, 24, after a man in his 40s was found with serious injuries in Alum Rock Road on Fri... [636 chars]

title: New Zealand back to winning ways after holding off South Africa in Eden Park battle
description: New Zealand stayed firm at their Eden Park fortress to claim an attritional 24-17 win over South Africa in a heavyweight clash between the world’s top two rugby sides
content:

title: Sinner sees off Auger-Aliassime to reach historic US Open final with Alcaraz
description: Jannik Sinner beat Félix Auger-Aliassime in four sets to set up a third straight slam final with Carlos Alcaraz, with the US Open title and No 1 at stake
content: Jannik Sinner will meet Carlos Alcaraz for the US Open title after the defending champion survived an injury scare to repel a spirited challenge from Félix Auger-Aliassime in four sets at Arthur Ashe Stadium. The world No 1 prevailed 6-1, 3-6, 6-3, 6... [4888 chars]

title: ICE raid on Hyundai plant in Georgia swept up workers on visitor visas
description: South Korea foreign affairs minister said he felt a "great sense of responsibility" over the arrest of more than 300 South Koreans.
content:
Many of the car workers arrested in a huge US workplace immigration raid had violated their visitor visas, officials say.
Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) said 475 people, mostly South Korean citizens - were found to be illegally working at ... [2553 chars]
